about_the_game:
The abandoned pit leads through a winding tunnel, supported by rotting wooden pillars, to the central hall. The hall is lined with dusty crates and barrels. In the middle, there is a rotating disc, which can connect the different rails running through the area. A maze of corridors running from here weaves through the mountain. In the distance, the roar of an underground river seeps in, and in one of the tunnels, tiny firefly-like beetles dance, enticing those who pass by, with their pale purple twilight.

This DLC contains 5 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
